Class HtmlTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • HtmlTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HtmlComponent

    public class HtmlTag
extends java.lang.Object
implements HtmlComponent
    A HtmlComponent for HTML-style tags, such as the br and hr tags.
    Since:
    October 21st, 2016
    Author:
    Ofek Gila, Saagar Jha
